header.title: Zvishandiso zveSalatiso OHS
intro.title: Kuchengetedza Hutano muKuvaka
intro.description: Iva nechokwadi chekutevedzera mitemo yehutano nekuchengetedza mukuvaka nezvishandiso zveSalatiso OHS. Zvishandiso zvedu zvinokubatsira kubata njodzi, kutevedzera zvinodiwa nemutemo, uye kuchengetedza vashandi panzvimbo yebasa, zvichishandisa nzira dzakanakisa dzakatsanangurwa mu'Chengetedza Kutanga: Zvinhu Zvakakosha zveZvirongwa zveOHS'.
legal_obligations.client.title: Zvisungo zveMutengi
legal_obligations.client.reg_5_1_a: Mitemo yeKuvaka 5(1)(a): Gadzirira Kuongorora Njodzi kweBhesi (BRA) inotsanangura njodzi dzeprojekiti.
legal_obligations.client.reg_5_1_b: Mitemo yeKuvaka 5(1)(b): Ipa Tsananguro yeHutano & Kuchengetedza inotsanangura zvinhu zvakakosha zveprojekiti.
legal_obligations.client.reg_5_1_l: Mitemo yeKuvaka 5(1)(l): Bvumidza Chirongwa cheHutano & Kuchengetedza cheMukontrakta basa risati ratanga.
legal_obligations.contractor.title: Zvisungo zveMukontrakta
legal_obligations.contractor.reg_7_1_a: Mitemo yeKuvaka 7(1)(a): Gadzira Chirongwa cheHutano & Kuchengetedza chakavakirwa patsananguro yemutengi.
legal_obligations.contractor.reg_7_1_b: Mitemo yeKuvaka 7(1)(b): Chengetedza Fayiro yeHutano & Kuchengetedza panzvimbo yebasa ine zvinyorwa zvose zvinodiwa.
legal_obligations.contractor.reg_9: Mitemo yeKuvaka 9: Ita Kuongorora Njodzi uye Kuona Njodzi (HIRAs) zvichienderana nebasa chairo.
legal_obligations.professional.title: Zvisungo zveVashandi veH&S
legal_obligations.professional.reg_5_5: Mitemo yeKuvaka 5(5): Vamiriri (PrCHSA) vanotonga H&S vakamirira mutengi, vachivimbisa kutevedzera.
legal_obligations.professional.reg_8_5: Mitemo yeKuvaka 8(5): Vakuru (CHSO) vanobatsira Makontrakta mukushandisa nekutarisa zvishandiso zveH&S.
legal_obligations.professional.sacpcmp: Mirayiro yeSACPCMP: Vanofanirwa kuchengetedza kunyoresa uye zvinodiwa zveCPD kumabasa avo ehunyanzvi.
wizard.step_0: Ndapota sarudza chiito kuti utange maitiro.

wizard.step_1.error: Ndapota sarudza kanenge zvinyorwa zvako zvauchagadzira.

wizard.step_2.client_contact_role_error: Ndapota isa basa remunhu wokufonera wemutengi.
wizard.step_3.title: Nhano 3 ye9: Mukontrakta Agadzwa Here?

wizard.step_4.contractor_contact_role_er: Ndapota isa basa remunhu wokufonera wemukontrakta.
wizard.step_5.title: Nhano 5 ye9: Zvinyorwa zveProjeki

wizard.step_8.title: Nhano 8 ye9: Yakagadzirirwa
wizard.step_8.specify_error: Ndapota tsanangura kuti zvinyorwa izvi zvakagadzirirwa ani.
wizard.step_9.title: Nhano 9 ye9: Ongorora uye Wedzera muChitundumupimo
wizard.step_9.description: Ongorora zvausarudza uye wedzera zvinyorwa muchitundumupimo chako kuti upedze.
cart.title: Chitundumupimo Chako
cart.invoice_reference: Nhamba Yereferensi Yeinvois: (Inoshanda kweMazuva 7. Nyoresa kuti Uchengetedze Zvekusingaperi!)
resources.title: Taura Nezvepamusoro veH&S Vakabvumirwa
resources.description: Unoda rubatsiro rwepamusoro? Taura nevepamusoro vakabvumirwa nezvido zveprojekti yako.
resources.jane_doe: Jane Doe, Ejenti yeSACPCMP (PrCHSA) - Nhamba Yekunyoresa: PR12345 - Taura: jane.doe@example.com
resources.john_smith: John Smith, Mukuru weSACPCMP (CHSO) - Nhamba Yekunyoresa: CHSO67890 - Taura: john.smith@example.com
footer.copyright: © 2025 Zvishandiso zveSalatiso OHS. Kodzero dzese dzakachengetedzwa.
footer.newsletter.title: Ramba Uri Mukuziva
sidebar.step_0.title: 📜 Kutevedzera kweOHS
sidebar.step_0.description: Tanga nekusarudza basa kuti uve nechokwadi chekutevedzera mutemo wehutano nekuchengetedza pabasa.
sidebar.step_0.fun_fact: ⚡ Chinhu Chinonakidza: Wakamboziva here kuti zvinyorwa zveOHS zvakanaka zvinogona kuderedza zviitiko pabasa kusvika pa30%? Ngatitangei!
sidebar.step_1.title: 📋 Mutemo
sidebar.step_1.description: Mitemo yeKuvaka 5(1)(b) inoda Tsananguro yeHutano neKuchengetedza yezvirongwa zvose, ukuwo 7(1)(b) ichida Fayiro yeH&S.
sidebar.step_1.fun_fact: 🛡️ Chinhu Chinonakidza: Tsananguro yeH&S yakasimba inogona kuderedza tsaona ne30%! Zvakafanana nechivharo chekuchengetedza cheprojekti yako.
sidebar.step_2.title: 📋 Mutemo
sidebar.step_2.description: Mitemo yeKuvaka 5: Vatengi vanofanirwa kupa Tsananguro yeHutano & Kuchengetedza uye kuvimbisa kutevedzera kwemakontrakta.
sidebar.step_2.fun_fact: 💼 Chinhu Chinonakidza: Vatengi vanochengetedza kunyoresa kweCOIDA vanogona kudzivirira faindi dzakakura—chengeta nhamba iyoyo padyo!
sidebar.step_3.title: 📜 Mutemo
sidebar.step_3.description: Mitemo yeKuvaka 7(1)(a): Makontrakta anofanirwa kugadzira Chirongwa cheHutano & Kuchengetedza chakavakirwa patsananguro yemutengi.
sidebar.step_3.fun_fact: 🤝 Chinhu Chinonakidza: Kugadza mukontrakta nekukurumidza kunogona kukurumidza kutevedzera—basa rechikwata rinoita kuti chiroto chekuchengetedza chishande!
sidebar.step_4.title: 📋 Mutemo
sidebar.step_4.description: Mitemo yeKuvaka 7(1)(b): Makontrakta anofanirwa kuchengetedza Fayiro yeHutano & Kuchengetedza panzvimbo yebasa ine zvinyorwa zvose zvinodiwa.
sidebar.step_4.fun_fact: 📞 Chinhu Chinonakidza: Kuchengetedza zvinyorwa zvekufonera zvemukontrakta zvakarongeka zvinogona kuponesa zuva pakukurumidza—ramba wakabatana!
sidebar.step_5.title: 📜 Mutemo
sidebar.step_5.description: Mitemo yeKuvaka 3(1): Mvumo inodiwa kwezvirongwa zvinodarika R40,000 kana zvinotora mazuva anopfuura 180.
sidebar.step_5.fun_fact: 🚧 Chinhu Chinonakidza: Kero dzakajeka dzenzvimbo dzinobatsira mabasa ekukurumidza kukuwana nekukurumidza—usarega kukanganisa kwezvinyorwa kudzivisa rubatsiro!
sidebar.step_6.title: 📋 Mutemo
sidebar.step_6.description: Mitemo yeKuvaka 9: Kuona Njodzi uye Kuongorora Njodzi (HIRAs) zvichienderana nebasa chairo zvinodiwa kwezviitiko zvose.
sidebar.step_6.fun_fact: 🔍 Chinhu Chinonakidza: Kuona zviitiko zvine njodzi nekukurumidza zvinogona kuderedza njodzi ne25%—zvakafanana nekupa projekti yako simba rekuchengetedza!
sidebar.step_7.title: 📜 Mutemo
sidebar.step_7.description: Mirayiro yeSACPCMP: CHSO nePrCHSA vanofanirwa kuchengetedza kunyoresa uye zvinodiwa zveCPD kuti vave nechokwadi chekutevedzera.
sidebar.step_7.fun_fact: 🧑‍💼 Chinhu Chinonakidza: Nyanzvi yeSACPCMP yakanyoreswa inogona kuderedza zvakanyanya njodzi dzemutemo—MVP yekuchengetedza yeprojekti yako!
sidebar.step_8.title: 📋 Mutemo
sidebar.step_8.description: Mitemo yeKuvaka 5(1)(l): Vatengi vanofanirwa kubvumidza chirongwa cheH&S chemukontrakta basa risati ratanga.
sidebar.step_8.fun_fact: 📝 Chinhu Chinonakidza: Mutoro wakajeka muzvinyorwa unogona kusimudzira kujekesa kweprojekti—munhu wese anoziva basa rake!
sidebar.step_9.title: 📜 Mutemo
sidebar.step_9.description: Mutemo weHutano neKuchengetedza paBasa: Zvinyorwa zvakanaka zvinovimbisa kutevedzera uye kuchengetedza vese vanobatanidzwa.
sidebar.step_9.fun_fact: 🛒 Chinhu Chinonakidza: Chitundumupimo chako ndicho chishandiso chako chekuchengetedza—gwaro rega rega raunowedzera rinoita kuti projekti yako iwedzere kuchengetedzeka!
